participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Caring and determined, Alex is someone who values family and loves animals deeply. She is optimistic and enjoys the comforts of home.
participant_1.background: I work from home, and it allows me to spend a lot of time with my dog. I'm proud of my ability to persevere through difficult times and continue to succeed in my career. My most exotic place was in the mountains of Nepal where I went hiking and got to see the Himalayas. I treasure my dog, Petrucci, more than anything else. I get nervous about my juicing bar, but I have a solid plan and I know it will work because I have the support of my family.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Friendly and ambitious, Jordan is eager to start his career while also nurturing his love for animals. He is sociable and enjoys spending time outdoors.
participant_2.background: I am single but I am looking for someone to share my life with. I am passionate about serving my country, but I would like to find a job that is closer to home so that I can spend more time with my family. I play with my dog and learn about animals because I want to be a veterinarian when I grow up. My mother and father are both in the church choir. I love to play tennis.

content.text: Pretty good! I'm excited to start this new job I just got.
That's awesome! What will you be doing?
I'll be working in the customer service department for a local company.
Nice! I work from home, so I don't get to interact with customers too much.
That's cool, I've always wanted to work from home.
It has its pros and cons, but I do enjoy it for the most part.
What are some of the pros and cons?
Well, the pros are that I can set my own hours, I can work in my pajamas, and I get to spend a lot of time with my dog.
That sounds really nice! I love dogs.
Me too! What's your dog's name?
His name is Buddy. He's a golden retriever.
Golden retrievers are so cute! I have a poodle named Petrucci.
Poodles are cute too! I've always wanted a poodle.
Well, you're welcome to come over and play with Petrucci anytime.
Thanks, I might just take you up on that offer!
